summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Crown Collective Creative (CCC) application. Backend APIs 94.4% successful, frontend 100% functional. Core functionality working well with only minor intake form validation issue.

validation_issues.issue: Intake form validation error - expects enum values 'branding', 'website', 'marketing', 'ai' instead of 'web_design', and requires 'answers' field

passed_tests: Login page navigation and form elements
Client portal dashboard with quick actions
All client portal pages (orders, intake, messages, projects, files)
Navigation between admin and client sections
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix intake form validation: Update enum values to match expected format ('branding', 'website', 'marketing', 'ai') and ensure 'answers' field is properly handled in the intake model/endpoint
